<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record Page default">39f4666c97651110272ef8971153afbf</macroponent><name>header_image/NODE__isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params

function evaluateProperty({api}) {
  if (api.data.gform
    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader
    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.headerImageItem
    && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.headerImageItem.headerImage)
      return false;
	return true;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-23 06:46:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>f9f426ac97651110272ef8971153affa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>header_image/NODE__isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_f9f426ac97651110272ef8971153affa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-23 06:46:07</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
